page.title: 20BARRETTS OF FECKENHAM 2
page.content: The present shop has been re fitted this year into separate pine shelved departments. Barretts of Feckenham advertise on Midlands television so they attract custom from all round the West Midlands. They are one of the biggest outlets for saddlery and riding clothes in the country. The camping section is demonstrated in the adjacent field and is open for nine months of the year. Barretts employ about 25 staff on a full time and part time basis. It is however still essentially a family run business with the Barrett family holding the majority of shares. Most of the emplyees travel from Bromsgrove or Redditch each day. As there is no public transport the store has a van to collect their staff each morning.
